Question: Which statements are true regarding the movies and music composition related to 'Bharat' and 'Student of the Year 2'?
Options:
A. Both 'Bharat' and 'Student of the Year 2' are Bollywood films released in recent years.
B. 'Bharat' and 'Tiger Zinda Hai' were both directed by Ali Abbas Zafar.
C. The music for 'Tiger Zinda Hai' was composed by Vishal–Shekhar.
D. 'Student of the Year 2' was directed by Ali Abbas Zafar.
Answer: A) Both 'Bharat' and 'Student of the Year 2' are Bollywood films released in recent years., C) The music for 'Tiger Zinda Hai' was composed by Vishal–Shekhar.
